name: Lighten Object, Mass
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Inner Sea Gods © 2014, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell functions like lighten object, except that it affects a number of objects equal to half your caster level.
target_zh: 多件物品或1立方尺物体/等级，这些物品之间相距不能超过30尺。
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同物品轻量（Lighten Object）一般，不过该法术可以影响的物品数量等同于你施法者等级的一半。
